body.name: Retro Game Console, Mini Classic Game System with 2 Classic Wireless Controllers and Built-in 620 Games, RCA Output Plug & Play Childhood Mini Classic Console, Birthday Gifts.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 4 hrs 57 mins
features: 🎮【Retro Game Console】：Classic game console was very popular in 1980s-1990s,which contains 620 classic video games including many classic games from the last century, more than 300 completely different video games allow you to participate throughout the day to make up for your childhood regrets. Multiple video game types, such as action, puzzles, sports, fighting and racing,it's still so exciting and challenging to play.

🎮【PLUG & PLAY】：Supporing Two-Person For Game War,It's With a Lot of Fun;This mini classic console is RCA output,Just plug &play,No need to insert cards or Download Games,the operation is simple,start to play.

🎮【Best family Activity for Kids]】：Classic Mini Retro Game Console gives your children the chance to experience your growth and happiness,and promote the communication and feelings with your children.Let children enjoy the same happiness and fun in their childhood as you did! The nes retro games can also practice children's logical thinking and bring them confidence in game success.

🎮【IMPORTANT NOTICE】： It's a third-party product,No Debugging,Plug And Play.There are some game repetitions in this mini console.This is an 8-bit game console with simple controls and picture quality will not be as crisp as today's games,and frozen sometimes,But many classic games are still fun and very challenging.

🎮【OUR GUARANTEE】：This game console cannot save progress, and some games are in Japanese. We provide 30 days no reason to replace a faulty product or refund. If you have any question about our product, please feel free to contact us and let us know about the issue and we will reply in 24 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: THE BEST GAMES OF THE 1980S AND 1990S ARE BUILT IN THE AKARSOLY RETRO GAME CONSOLE WITH WIRELESS CONTROLLER This is a third-party game console. For those who are new to the super classic game consoles: this is an 8-bit retro game console with simple controls and the picture quality is not as crisp as today's games. You may not get used to the game system at first, but many classic games are still challenging.It provides 2 wireless controllers so that you can play games more conveniently. (Note that the controller connected first to the console is the primary controller and only the primary controller can control the console. The controller connected secondly to the console is the secondary controller, which functions only after you selected the 2 players' mode and when it's the 2nd player's turn to play the game.)

AN AV CABLE IS INCLUDED, AND HDMI NOT. Connect the video game console to the AV port of the TV, connect the power cord to the nes console, and then adjust the TV signal source to the AV channel to display TV games list screen on the TV. It is old fashioned video games for your television.Put 4 AAA NEW fully charged batteries into 2 game controllers, and use controller to control the kids video game consola videojuegos for the first time.The battery is not included in the package, you need to prepare it yourself. Each controller needs 2 AAA batteries.Quit the plug and play video games: Press SECECT + START at the same time for two seconds.

620 CLASSIC 80S AND 90S GAMES BUILT IN VIDEO GAME CONSOLE The classic games types included: action games, shooting games, sports games, fighting games, racing games, puzzle games.it some games are in Japanese, and some games repeat. Do not save progress.Easy to Use: Plug and play. No installation is required.
Easy to Use, Plug and Play If you are looking for something fashionable and high-tech, don't choose it

Easy to carry, Easy to use This super mini retro game console adopts a compact design. It is easy to carry and easy to use. You can put it into your pocket and carry it to your old friends' place and enjoy the games of your childhood together and relive childhood memories together. Promote Communication Can't find a topic to communicate with your child? The mini game console allows your children to experience the growing experience and happiness, and enhance communication and emotions with the children. Amazing Gift Share your childhood with your friends or kids, having the super retro consoles as a great holiday or birthday gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Many repeated games. No Rc Pro-m /Zelda/CastleVania. BUT Still worth buying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Takes me back to my childhood.
reviews.reviewText: what a great buy especially for the price. I remember a good portion of this game for my childhood. Good games without the clutter of old game cartridges.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Terrible graphics, terrible controllers, you can’t save the game.
reviews.reviewText: Terrible graphics almost unplayable, terrible controllers with lag, you can’t save the game.This whole thing is a joke! Return it in two minutes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I gave this product 4 stars, because that have great games and it brings me back to my childhood, but one of the controllers stick and it's hard to play with. I wish this company would sell extra controllers, or at least send me a replacement one. Other then that it's a good product for the price I paid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Blast from past
reviews.reviewText: Fun for me for a couple hours, brought back some memories. However I bought it for my 11 yr old son because he was interested in th games I used to play. He is no longer interested in the games I used to play and can't under stand why I liked them. I'm feeling the same way, guess i just like them because there was nothing better at the time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the price!
reviews.reviewText: Not the best visual quality, but easy to install, controllers hooked up with ease. All the games I have played play great. I would buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I’m a kid again!
reviews.reviewText: Love this 8-bit wonder. Some of the games are things I’d never heard of, but so cool and brings back my childhood.
